q2-success.copy: You haven't submitted an expression of interest within the last 12 months

q2-fail.copy: You have submitted an expression of interest within the last 12 months

q3-success.copy: Your organisation's income is between £250,000 and £10 million

q3-fail.copy: Your organisation's income is over £10 million

q4-success.copy: Your project will use sport as a tool for social change

q4-fail.copy: Your project won't use sport as a tool for social change

q5-success.copy: You don't want funding for any of our non-eligible areas

q5-fail.copy: You do want funding for one or more of our non-eligible areas

q6-success.copy: Your project will take place in one of our funded countries

q6-fail.copy: Your project won't take place in one of our funded countries
